name: HANE: The search of the lost feather
name_original: HANE: The search of the lost feather
description:
Help Naru to restore his memories, so he can get his town back. A mysterious dark energy called The Black Wolf, stole from him everything he could remember. You will go across a lot of dangers and diverse places, where you will meet enemies. Don't worry, if you listen carefully, the voices of the zones will help you out.

In this zip project you will find, the build data whre you will see the prototype of the game and instructions manual as well.
